testcase.name: Check the service get method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseGet = read('classpath:karate/request/client_consult_get/ResponseGet.json') . passed Given path 'users', '2' ................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseGet ......................................... passed And match response..id contains [2] ...................................... passed And match response.data contains {"first_name": "Janet"} ................. passed And assert response.support.text == "To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!" . passed And assert response.data.email == email ................................... passed And assert response.data.id == '2' ........................................ passed And assert response.data.first_name == "Janet" ............................ passed And assert response.data.last_name == "Weaver" ............................ passed * def name = response.data.first_name ..................................... passed * def lastname = response.data.last_name .................................. passed And assert name + lastname == 'JanetWeaver' ............................... passed * def id = response.data.id ............................................... passed
